definition: raccoon dog (Nyctereutes procyonoides)/raccoon of North China, Korea and Japan (Japanese: tanuki)/also pr. [hao2]
worm-like invertebrate/mythical animal (see 獬豸[xie4 zhi4])/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 153)
jackals of the same tribe (idiom); fig. They are all just as bad as each other.
raccoon dog (Nyctereutes procyonoides)/raccoon of North China, Korea and Japan (Japanese: tanuki)/also called 狸
precious fur obtained from skin of raccoon dog after removing hard bristle

sentences.english: It was concluded from the results that the 8 isolated viruses from raccoon dog represent parvovirus.
sentences.chinese: 表明，分离的这8株病毒均为貉源细小病毒。

sentences.english: I want a good cut of meat.
sentences.chinese: 我要一片好场珐摆貉肢股扮瘫堡凯肉。

sentences.english: An evil raccoonthatattacks passerby with weapons.
sentences.chinese: 一个邪恶的貉，袭击行人与武器。

definition: wild beast/wild horse/lion/trad. form used erroneously for 貌/simplified form used erroneously for 狻
